home.title: AI-Powered English Learning
home.subtitle: Generate contextual sentences using your vocabulary with advanced AI reasoning. Powered by SiliconFlow's dynamic model selection for enhanced learning experiences.
home.poweredBy: Powered by SiliconFlow with Dynamic Model Selection & AI Reasoning

features.title: Powerful AI-Enhanced Learning
features.subtitle: Experience the future of English learning with advanced AI capabilities
features.aiEnhancedDesc: Advanced AI models with dynamic selection generate natural sentences with detailed reasoning explanations for better learning.
features.grammarInsightsDesc: Receive detailed grammar explanations and AI reasoning to understand sentence construction better.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple steps to enhance your English learning with AI-powered sentence generation
howItWorks.step1Desc: Explore public content freely or create an account for full features
howItWorks.step2Desc: Build your vocabulary collection with words you want to practice
howItWorks.step3Desc: Create contextual sentences with AI reasoning and grammar explanations
howItWorks.step4Desc: Share with the community and learn from others' creations

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your English Learning?
cta.subtitle: Experience the power of AI-enhanced language learning with personalized sentence generation, detailed explanations, and a supportive community.

footer.copyright: English Learning Platform. Built with Vue.js and Express.js.

apiKey.title: AI Configuration
apiKey.subtitle: Configure your AI model settings and API keys for enhanced functionality
apiKey.platformDescription: Use our platform's built-in AI configuration with automatic model selection and optimization.
apiKey.platformKeyDescription: The platform provides optimized AI models with automatic fallback and load balancing.
apiKey.customKeyDescription: Use your own SiliconFlow API key for direct access to AI models.
apiKey.existingKeyHint: You have an existing API key configured. Leave empty to keep current key.
apiKey.securityNote: Your API key is encrypted and stored securely. It will only be used for AI model requests.
apiKey.switchToPlatformMessage: This will disable your custom API key and use the platform's AI configuration instead.
apiKey.switchToPlatformWarning: Your custom API key will be removed from the system.
apiKey.publicKeyFetchError: Unable to fetch public key for encryption
